The combined maturity schedule for the Bonds, subject to adjustment of the amount and the maturity schedule for the Refunding Bonds to meet the escrow and payment requirements of the refunded bonds as set forth in the full notice of sale, is as follows:
Year Amount Year Amount Year Amount

The Bonds will be issued in book-entry form only, in the form of one certificate for the aggregate principal amount of the Bonds maturing in each year. The Bonds are redeemable at the option of the Board in accordance with the terms set forth in the full Notice of Sale. The Board will furnish Bonds and the approving legal opinion of McManimon & Scotland, Newark, N.J. The Bonds will bear interest at the rate or rates per annum in multiples of 1/8 or 1/20 of 1% (ascending rates and only one rate per maturity) specified by the successful bidder payable semiannually on February 1 and August 1 in each year until maturity, commencing on August 1, 1997. The Bonds will be awarded to the bidder on whose bid the total loan may be made at the lowest net interest cost in accordance with the terms set forth in the full Notice of Sale. The full Notice of Sale, the Official Statement and bid forms are available by contacting Dora E. Mylchreest, the Board Secretary at Asbury Park Board of Education, 407 Lake Avenue, Asbury Park, N.J. 07712, (908) 776-2663.
* Amounts subject to change as provided herein. (From The Bond Buyer)
